text: Foxtrot, also known as The Far Side of Paradise, is a 1977 British Mexican movie directed by Arturo Ripstein and starring Peter O'Toole, Charlotte Rampling, Max von Sydow. It was distributed by New World Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1976 drama movies Category:1970s British drama movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Movies directed by Arturo Ripstein
title: Foxtrot (1976 movie)
